articles.title: Reddit kicks out moderators, takes over one of the biggest protesting subreddits - HT Tech
articles.description: Reddit has taken over r/malefashionadvice, a subreddit with 5.4 million members, and has removed all the moderators that were keeping the subreddit private to protest against the company’s API changes.
